title: PBE please?
body:
> "New testers are recruited every few weeks. On top of checking for a few basic criteria, our selection process is catered to what we’re testing in a given cycle: for instance, if we're designing a tanky support champion, we might invite a batch of experienced Leona and Taric players to help out."

Now the new PBE patch is here, the quote above is from the PBE application. I am a Katarina main and the PBE now has the reworked Katarina. I would just like for someone really to look over my account again to try and get me an account. Now, I have been waiting for almost a year now for a response of any kind if it was possible. 
                    Thanks for reading
                         blueberryman99

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot manually review accounts for PBE access by request. The testers are chosen based on the criteria above and by players who are really active and are a positive influence on the community.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for a complete rundown on the system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
thank you for the reply, i play every day and i believe i am a positive influence, I would just like to know what is taking so long. My friend got his acc in 3 months, i have been waiting a year Q-Q.
Put simply- I don't know. I don't have the ability to manually review your PBE application. At this point, it's a waiting game while you continue to be active in League.
Ok den, thank you for taking your time to reply

I forgot the log in info for my pbe account (haven't used it since the mage updates) and requested my pw to be sent to me via email. That was 3 hours ago. Why the hell is it taking so long to get a simple email that most companies get out in a few minutes?
